step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Nice movement! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together as you roll them down.
Great job completing the first set! Remember to breathe deeply.
Second set starting strong! Ensure your shoulders are moving in a smooth circle.
Excellent control! Try to keep your elbows slightly bent throughout the motion.
Fantastic finish! You're doing a great job regaining shoulder mobility.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Breathing deeply as you pull back helps improve oxygen flow. Keep up the excellent work on regaining shoulder mobility!
